title: Free Champion
body: Has anyone got their free champion from Ocean Week yet or is it just me?

replies.body: I got Sion just then. Probably the only Champ I don't enjoy. . . .oh well
Yeah just got it today, got Kindred, which is the one I wanted, guess Riot are mind readers
i didn't get a champion for some od reason... but I got more than 10 points and we only needed 4??

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/LryNggNH-ocean-week-mystery-champion-update

> Hey everyone,
>
As some of you have noticed the Ocean Week reward for a Mystery Champion sendout has begun.
>
This process is done in batches, so if you haven't received yours yet and you earned at least 4 points during Ocean Week don't worry it will come during the week. The process should complete at the end of this week.
>
Once it's finished we'll put a 'Mystery Champion is here!' article in the client.
>
Here's the site again for context! http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/
